#summary The layer z-index attribute
#labels about-html,is-html-attribute

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HTMLReference HTML Reference] > [HTMLElements Elements] > [LayerElement <layer> element] > *z-index attribute*

== Usage ==

Do not use [LayerElement <layer>].  The `<layer>` element was introduced in [BrowserNetscape4 Netscape 4] and has never been supported by any other browser.

== Elements ==

You can use the `z-index` attribute on the following elements:

  * [IlayerElement <ilayer>]
  * [LayerElement <layer>]
